titles.title: A bill to amend the Toxic Substances Control Act to establish certain requirements regarding the disposal of polychlorinated biphenyls, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 6/15/1987--Introduced. Amends the Toxic Substances Control Act to apply the standards of the Solid Waste Disposal Act concerning the treatment, storage, and disposal of hazardous wastes to polychlorinated biphenyls.
